### \acrlong{s-aslope}

The \gls{s-aslope} operated during the months of October to November aboard the F\slash V _Half Moon_ in 1984, September to October aboard the F\slash V _Golden Fleece_ in 1989, and October to November aboard the R\slash V _Miller Freeman_ in all other years. Partial coverage of the U.S. West Coast occurred during the years 1984 and 1988--1996 and complete coverage (i.e., north of 34\textdegree 30\textquotesingle S) during the years 1997 and 1999--2001. Typically, only these latter four years are included in assessments.
